mapper.select: SELECT o.id as ordersId, o.`no`, o.`status`, o.arrival_time, o.tail_money, o.total_money, o.refund_money, o.create_date, o.payment_date, o.refund_date, o.assemble_seats, o.assemble_seats_count, o.assemble_seats_surplus, m.`name` as merchantName, m.logo, m.label, m.address, m.latitude, m.longitude, m.tel, mg.`name` as goodsName FROM ds_orders o LEFT JOIN ds_merchant m ON o.seller = m.id LEFT JOIN ds_merchant_goods mg ON o.goods_id = mg.id WHERE o.id = #{ordersId} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM ds_orders o WHERE o.id = #{ordersId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT o.id as ordersId, m.name as merchantName, o.status, m.percapita, o.arrival_time, o.assemble_seats_count, o.assemble_seats_surplus, mg.`name` as goodsName FROM ds_orders o LEFT JOIN ds_merchant m ON o.seller = m.id LEFT JOIN ds_merchant_goods mg ON o.goods_id = mg.id WHERE o.assemble_seats = ${_BOOLEAN_STATUS_YES} AND o.buyer = #{userId} ORDER BY mg.create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT o.id as ordersId, mm.name as merchantName, mm.address, mm.logo, o.arrival_time, oi.status, m.id as launchUserId, m.avatar as launchUserAvatar FROM ds_orders_invitation oi LEFT JOIN ds_orders o ON oi.orders_id = o.id LEFT JOIN ds_member m ON o.buyer = m.id LEFT JOIN ds_merchant mm ON o.seller = mm.id WHERE oi.member_id = #{userId} AND oi.`owner` = ${_BOOLEAN_STATUS_NO} ORDER BY oi.create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
